Class FriendshipService

java.lang.Object
org.example.service.AbstractService<Long, Friendship>
org.example.service.FriendshipService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service<Long, Friendship>
public class FriendshipService extends AbstractService<Long, Friendship>
Service layer for managing Friendship entities.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(String... fields)
      Adds a new friendship between two users.
      Parameters:
      fields - the ids of the two users to be friends
      Throws:
      IdValidationException - if the ids are not valid numbers
      EntityNotFoundException - if any of the users do not exist
      EntityAlreadyExists - if the friendship already exists

    • remove

      public void remove(String id)
      Removes a friendship by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the friendship to remove
      Throws:
      IdValidationException - if the id is not a valid number
      EntityNotFoundException - if the friendship does not exist

    • generateID

      public Long generateID()
      Generates a new unique id for a friendship.
      Returns:
      a new unique id

    • exists

      public boolean exists(String idFirstFriend, String idSecondFriend)
      Checks if a friendship exists between two users.
      Parameters:
      idFirstFriend - the id of the first user
      idSecondFriend - the id of the second user
      Returns:
      true if the friendship exists, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IdValidationException - if any id is not a valid number

    • removeAllFriendshipsOfUser

      public void removeAllFriendshipsOfUser(String id)
      Removes all friendships of a user given the user's id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the user whose friendships are to be removed
      Throws:
      IdValidationException - if the id is not a valid number

    • getNumberOfCommunities

      public int getNumberOfCommunities()
      Returns the number of communities (connected groups of users) with at least two members.
      Returns:
      the number of communities

    • getMostSociableCommunity

      public List<Long> getMostSociableCommunity()
      Returns the most sociable community (the connected component with the largest diameter).
      Returns:
      the list of user ids in the most sociable community
